subject: Ghosts
Hotels and Motels
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Pfister Hotel is a regal address that may be the city’s best. But for some Brewers opponents “everything’s scary” and a Motel 6 would do.
snippet: The Pfister Hotel is a regal address that may be the city’s best. But for some Brewers opponents “everything’s scary” and a Motel 6 would do.
